description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget named EventCard, which displays event details in a styled card, including title, description, date, time, and optional reminder indicator.

classes.name: EventCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that renders information about an Event object, including title, description, start date/time, and reminder status.

methods.name: EventCard
methods.description: Constructor for EventCard widget, requiring an Event instance.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the event card, displaying event details with styling and conditional icons.
